onMessage.description: Lookup graph context for consulting queries

onError.description: Run health check when errors occur

cron.message: Call /health quick to check Backend and RLM. Do NOT run shell commands or type widgetdc_mcp as bash. Summarize as JSON with overall_status, service_breakdown, incidents, next_actions. End with OpenClaw Bot - infra-health:

Call /cicd status to check CI/CD. Do NOT run shell commands or type widgetdc_mcp as bash. Summarize as JSON with repo_status, failed_checks, required_actions, run_receipt. End with OpenClaw Bot - github-cicd:
Call /graph stats to get node and relationship counts. Do NOT run shell commands. Summarize as JSON with status, graph_kpis, anomalies, next_actions. End with OpenClaw Bot - data-graph-health:

Call /supervisor status and /task fetch to check pending work. Do NOT run shell commands. Summarize as JSON with plan, assignments, blocked_items, verification. End with OpenClaw Bot - orchestrator-sync:

Use web_search to find recent critical CVEs for Node.js, Express, Neo4j. Do NOT run shell commands. Summarize as JSON with critical_findings, cvss_summary, affected_components, remediation_plan. End with OpenClaw Bot - security-cve-scan:

Call /graph stats to check data freshness. Do NOT run shell commands. Summarize as JSON with freshness_index, stale_sources_top10, harvest_delta, next_actions. End with OpenClaw Bot - harvester-freshness:

Review platform status from memory and recent activity. Do NOT run shell commands. Produce JSON with top_3_decisions, top_3_risks, top_3_next_steps, owners_deadlines. End with OpenClaw Bot - strategist-daily:
